original_text: But Hamor said to them, “My son Shechem has his heart set on your daughter. Please give her to him as his wife.
korean_text: 하몰이 그들에게 이르되 내 아들 세겜이 마음으로 너희 딸을 연연하여 하니 원하건대 그를 세겜에게 주어 아내로 삼게 하라

sentences.original_text: My son Shechem has his heart set on your daughter
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 아들 세겜이 네 딸에게 마음을 두었으니

sentences.original_text: Please give her to him as his wife
